thread.title: Eagles are prime-time players for next three games
thread.title_full: Eagles are prime-time players for next three games

title: Eagles are prime-time players for next three games
text:
SHOP: Eagles Training Camp sportswear 
The Eagles host the Giants next Monday night, followed by a Sunday night game against the Panthers in Charlotte, N.C. They then have a bye before taking on the Cowboys on Nov. 8, also a Sunday night. 
We checked with stat guru Boop Vetrone, of BoopStats fame, and he informed us that the Birds don't play another day game for 34 days. That will be Nov. 15, when they host the Dolphins. 
Boop says Chip Kelly is a respectable 6-3 in prime-time games in his three years as Eagles coach. His predecessor, Andy Reid was 30-23. All other Eagles coaches combined are 22-20. October memory 
Youngsters might not know this, but there was a time when the Phillies played games in October. 
In fact, 35 years ago today, the Phillies beat Houston, 8-7, at the Astrodome to win the NLCS, three games to two and advance to the World Series where they defeated the Royals. 
The Phillies beat the Astros in the 10th inning when Garry Maddox doubled off Frank LaCorte to score Del Unser, who had also doubled. Quick response 
Kudos to the paramedics who revived an unidentified runner who suffered an apparent heart attack during yesterday's Chicago Marathon. 
The Chicago Tribune reported that the man, believed to be in his 60s, was taken by ambulance to a hospital where his condition stabilized.
